name: ELEC FAIL

procedure.text:
+“WARNING WARNING” voice Warning
Double DC Generator failure.
1. Pilot utility light — ON (for night operations).
2. GEN 1 & 2 switches — Select RESET and confirm ON.

procedure.heading: Warning clears
procedure.text:
Both generators back on line.
- Continue flight.
If 1(2) DC GEN FAIL illuminates:
- Carry out SINGLE DC GENERATOR FAILURE procedure. (See page 107)

procedure.heading: ELEC FAIL remains
procedure.text:
Confirm GEN BUS Switch (EDCU ELEC page) AUTO.
- Set AMMC 1 MASTER
- Select VHF 1 on right side to ensure continue radio communication.
- Carry out LANDING GEAR EMERGENCY DOWN PROCEDURE (See page 52).
- Land as soon as possible.
Loss of all MAIN BUS and all NON ESS BUS. See Notes 1 and 2.
Battery power is available for maximum 30 minutes.

notes: Note 1: See page 15 for services lost when BUS not available.

Note 2: If MAIN BUS 1 required, on EDCU ELEC page, set GEN BUS switch to OVRD to supply battery power to MAIN BUS 1 reducing the battery endurance. If BUS TIE is switched OVRD the battery power is also supplied to MAIN BUS 2, with a further reduction in battery endurance.
